livewire-jump.blade.icon.completion.desc: Enables autocompletion for `<x-*` Blade icon tags.
livewire-jump.blade.icon.dirs.descriptio:
Sets Blade icon directories and their tag prefixes. **Example:**

```json
{
	"resources/svg": "x-icon-", // for <x-icon-*>
	"vendor/blade-ui-kit/blade-heroicons/resources/svg": "x-heroicon-" // <x-heroicon-*>
}
```
livewire-jump.blade.icon.hover.descripti: Enables tooltips for Blade icon tags.
livewire-jump.blade.icon.link.descriptio: Enables links for Blade icon tags.
livewire-jump.blade.tag.completion.descr: Enables autocompletion for Blade component tags.
livewire-jump.blade.tag.hover.descriptio: Enables tooltips for Blade component tags.
livewire-jump.blade.tag.link.description: Enables links for Blade component tags.
livewire-jump.view.completion.descriptio: Enables autocompletion for views in function arguments.
livewire-jump.view.hover.description: Enables tooltips for views in function arguments.
livewire-jump.view.link.description: Enables links for views in function arguments.
livewire-jump.view.navigation.descriptio: Enables options to `Go to PHP Class` and `Go to Blade View` in Blade and PHP files.
livewire-jump.clearIndexedItems.title: Clear indexed items
livewire-jump.refreshBladeIcons.title: Refresh indexed Blade icons
livewire-jump.clearBladeIcons.title: Clear indexed Blade icons
livewire-jump.refreshViews.title: Refresh indexed views
livewire-jump.clearViews.title: Clear indexed views
livewire-jump.goToClass.title: Go to PHP Class
livewire-jump.goToView.title: Go to Blade View
